attributes.action: We demand a review on the UK's drug laws in light of the two deaths over the weekend of the 26th and 27th of november.
attributes.additional_details: Countless people every year die from useing class A drugs, in most cases becuase they are unaware of strenth and quality. People know the risks behind taking drugs, but still choose to use them. Its time for a drastic over hall of drug policy and law in the UK to ensure that no more people die needlessly from inpure and untested drugs. Safe and controled use, not proabition.
